$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-course.title: $:/xp/ui/Actions/new-course
$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-course.text:
\define get-tags() $(textFieldTags)$
\define get-text() $(textField)$
<$vars textFieldTags={{$:/config/new-course/Tags}} textField={{$:/config/new-course/Text}}>
<$action-sendmessage
	$message="tm-new-tiddler"
	title=<<now "course/YYYY0MM0DD0hh0mm0ssXXX">>
	tags=<<get-tags>>
	text=<<get-text>>
	background-color="#fff"
	caption="a course"
	color="red"
	icon="{{$:/core/images/video}}"
	image="$:/heiban.png"
	importance=""
	link=""
	linkcolor=""
/>
<!-- tidgraph view requires 3 tiddlers -->
<$list filter="[enlist[Planning Ongoing Completed]!has[title]]"> 
<$action-createtiddler $basetitle=<<currentTiddler>>/>
</$list>
</$vars>

$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-coursecategory.title: $:/xp/ui/Actions/new-coursecategory
$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-coursecategory.text:
\define get-tags() $(textFieldTags)$ $(tagsFieldTags)$
\define prefixText() <$text text={{{ [[<<list-courses "]] }}}/>
\define suffixText() <$text text={{{ [[">>]] }}}/>

<$vars newcategoryTitle={{$:/config/new-coursecategory/Title}}
  newcategoryCaption={{$:/config/new-coursecategory/Caption}}
  textFieldTags={{$:/config/new-coursecategory/Tags}}
  tagsFieldTags={{$:/config/new-coursecategory/Tags!!tags}}
  newcategoryCtag={{$:/config/new-coursecategory/Ctag}}
  ctagStoreTiddler="$:/config/new-coursecategory/Ctag"
  storeTiddler="$:/config/new-coursecategory/Title/input"
  listopsTiddler="$:/courses-category-others"
  >
<$reveal type="nomatch" state=<<newcategoryTitle>> text="">
  <$action-setfield $tiddler=<<storeTiddler>> text=<<newcategoryTitle>>/>
</$reveal>
<$wikify name="newcategoryText" text={{{ [<newcategoryCtag>addprefix<prefixText>addsuffix<suffixText>] }}}>
<$reveal type="match" state=<<newcategoryTitle>> text="">
  <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<<ctagStoreTiddler>> text="">
    <$action-createtiddler $basetitle=<<newcategoryTitle>> caption=<<newcategoryCaption>> tags=<<get-tags>> ctag=<<newcategoryCtag>> text=<<newcategoryText>> list-before=<<listopsTiddler>>/>
  </$reveal>
  <$reveal type="match" state=<<ctagStoreTiddler>> text="">
    <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-notify" $param="$:/language/Notifications/ctagEmpty"/>
  </$reveal>
</$reveal>
</$wikify>
</$vars>

$:/xp/ui/Buttons/new-course.title: $:/xp/ui/Buttons/new-course
$:/xp/ui/Buttons/new-course.caption: {{$:/core/images/new-button}} new course
$:/xp/ui/Buttons/new-course.text: \whitespace trim \define newcourseButton() <$button actions={{$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-course}} tooltip="Create a new course" aria-label="new course" class=<>> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/core/images/new-button}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text="new course"/> \end <>

$:/xp/ui/Buttons/new-coursecategory.title: $:/xp/ui/Buttons/new-coursecategory
$:/xp/ui/Buttons/new-coursecategory.caption: {{$:/core/images/new-button}} new category
$:/xp/ui/Buttons/new-coursecategory.text:
<$button
	actions={{$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-coursecategory}}
	tooltip="Create a new category"
	aria-label="new category">
Create
</$button>

COURSES.title: COURSES
COURSES.caption: {{$:/xp/images/courses}} COURSES
COURSES.text:
\import $:/courses-macros
<$button actions={{$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-course}} tooltip="Create a new course" aria-label="new course" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini"> {{$:/core/images/new-button}} new course  <> <>
<$macrocall $name="tabs" tabsList="$:/courses-aggregation-view $:/courses-category-view $:/courses-tidgraph-view" default="$:/courses-aggregation-view" state="$:/state/tab/course" />

$:/courses-managetabs.title: $:/courses-managetabs
$:/courses-managetabs.caption: {{$:/core/images/options-button}}
$:/courses-managetabs.text:
\import $:/courses-macros \define selectDefaultTab() <$select tiddler='$:/config/xp/aggregation-courses/category-view/DefaultTab'> <$list filter='[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag!has[draft.of]remove[$:/courses-newcategory $:/courses-managetabs]] :filter[lookup!match[hide]]'> \end ! 默认分类 设置维基启动后默认显示的标签页：<> ! 管理分类 Select which tabs will be shown. Drag and drop to change the ordering
''Caption'' -- //Ctag// <$macrocall $name="list-tagged-draggable" tag=<> subFilter="!has[draft.of]remove[$:/listing-courses-all $:/courses-newcategory $:/courses-managetabs]" itemTemplate="$:/templates/aggregation-categories-item" />

$:/courses-newcategory.title: $:/courses-newcategory
$:/courses-newcategory.caption: {{$:/core/images/new-button}}
$:/courses-newcategory.text:
\define titleStoreTiddler() $:/config/new-coursecategory/Title
\define captionStoreTiddler() $:/config/new-coursecategory/Caption
\define ctagStoreTiddler() $:/config/new-coursecategory/Ctag
\define storeTiddler() $:/config/new-coursecategory/Title/input
\define newButton() {{$:/xp/ui/Buttons/new-coursecategory}}

\define deleteButton()
\whitespace trim
<$vars newcategoryTitle={{$:/config/new-coursecategory/Title}}>
<$list filter="[<storeTiddler>get[text]match<newcategoryTitle>]" variable="ignore">
<$button tooltip="Delete existing tiddler" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini tc-small-gap-right">
{{$:/core/images/delete-button}}
<$action-confirm $message="Are you sure you wish to delete this tiddler?">
<$action-deletetiddler $filter="[<newcategoryTitle>] [<storeTiddler>]" />
</$action-confirm>
</$button>
</$list>
</$vars>
\end

\define promptText()
<$vars newcategoryTitle={{$:/config/new-coursecategory/Title}}>
<$list filter="[<storeTiddler>get[text]match<newcategoryTitle>]" variable="ignore">
{{$:/aggregation/ErrorText}}
</$list>
</$vars>
\end

! 新建分类

|<$link to=<<titleStoreTiddler>>>Title</$link> |<$edit-text tiddler=<<titleStoreTiddler>> default="" tag="input"/> <<deleteButton>> |
|<$link to=<<captionStoreTiddler>>>Caption</$link> |<$edit-text tiddler=<<captionStoreTiddler>> default="" tag="input"/> |
|<$link to=<<ctagStoreTiddler>>>Ctag</$link> |<$edit-text tiddler=<<ctagStoreTiddler>> default="" tag="input"/> |
|>| <<newButton>> |

<<promptText>>

{{$:/language/xp/aggregation/NewCategoryTips}}

$:/config/xp/aggregation-courses/categor.title: $:/config/xp/aggregation-courses/category/ctags
$:/config/xp/aggregation-courses/categor.text: Planning Ongoing Completed IT [[Languages and cultures]] Management Philosophy Economics Law [[Curriculum or pedagogy]] [[Literature and culture]] History Science Engineering [[Agriculture, forestry and gardening]] [[Medicine and health care]] [[Art and design]] Others

$:/courses-aggregation-view.title: $:/courses-aggregation-view
$:/courses-aggregation-view.caption: 聚合视图
$:/courses-aggregation-view.text:
\import $:/courses-macros
\define config-base() $:/config/xp/aggregation-courses/TableFields/Visibility/

<$wikify name="dtableFields" text="""<$list filter="[list[$:/config/xp/aggregation-courses/TableFields]]" variable="listField"><$reveal type="match" state=<<field-config-title>> text="show"> <$text text={{{ [<listField>format:titlelist[]] }}}/> </$reveal></$list>""">
<$macrocall
  $name="aggregation-filtersearch"
  fields=<<dtableFields>>
  state="aggregation-courses"
  class=""
  cardTemplate="$:/courses-card-template"
  searchClass="xp-search-courses"
  promptTiddler="$:/courses-prompt"
/>
</$wikify>

$:/courses-card-template.title: $:/courses-card-template
$:/courses-card-template.text: <$macrocall $name="thumbnail" link={{!!link}} icon={{!!icon}} color={{!!color}} background-color={{!!background-color}} image={{!!image}} caption={{!!caption}} width="220" height="123"/>

$:/courses-category-view.title: $:/courses-category-view
$:/courses-category-view.caption: 分类视图
$:/courses-category-view.text:
\import $:/courses-macros

<$wikify name="tabsList" text="""<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag<systemCTag>!has[draft.of]] :filter[lookup<config-base>!match[hide]]" variable="listItem"> <$text text={{{ [<listItem>format:titlelist[]] }}}/> </$list>""">
<$macrocall
  $name="tabs"
  tabsList=<<tabsList>>
  default={{$:/config/xp/aggregation-courses/category-view/DefaultTab}}
  class="tc-vertical"
/>
</$wikify>

$:/courses-help.title: $:/courses-help
$:/courses-help.text:
COURSES 是视频课程的索引界面。使用方法与 BOOKSHELF 基本一致，请参阅 [[Bookshelf Help|$:/bookshelf-help]]。
该主题预设分类标签以 [[Title List|https://tiddlywiki.com/static/Title%2520List.html]] 的形式存储于： <> 其他说明： * 分类使用「[[学堂在线|https://www.xuetangx.com/search?query=&channel=navigation_bar]]」的学科分类； * 课程封面图（宽高比 220:123 px），不支持 SVG。建议标题使用小写和下划线。为了管理，添加标签 <>。

$:/courses-macros.title: $:/courses-macros
$:/courses-macros.text:
\define aggregationTag() Course \define systemCTag() $:/tags/CourseCategories \define uiTitle() $:/config/xp/aggregation/ui/courses \define categoryPrefix() $:/config/xp/aggregation-courses/category/ \define config-base() $:/config/xp/aggregation-courses/Tabs/Visibility/ 
<$view field="text"/>

$:/courses-prompt.title: $:/courses-prompt
$:/courses-prompt.text:
{{$:/xp/images/course}}
New course will appear here

$:/courses-tidgraph-view.title: $:/courses-tidgraph-view
$:/courses-tidgraph-view.caption: 进度列表
$:/courses-tidgraph-view.text:
\import $:/courses-macros
\define aggrFilter() [tag[$(aggregationTag)$]!has[draft.of]sort[]]

<$list filter="[tag<aggregationTag>!has[draft.of]count[]!match[0]]" variable="ignore">

<$list filter="[tag<aggregationTag>tag[Planning]!has[draft.of]limit[1]]" variable="ignore">
<$tidgraph start="Planning" filter=<<aggrFilter>> nodetemplate="IconTemplate" maxdepth="1"/>
</$list>

<$list filter="[tag<aggregationTag>tag[Ongoing]!has[draft.of]limit[1]]" variable="ignore">
<$tidgraph start="Ongoing" filter=<<aggrFilter>> nodetemplate="IconTemplate" maxdepth="1"/>
</$list>

<$list filter="[tag<aggregationTag>tag[Completed]!has[draft.of]limit[1]]" variable="ignore">
<$tidgraph start="Completed" filter=<<aggrFilter>> nodetemplate="IconTemplate" maxdepth="1"/>
</$list>

</$list>
